info.name: MajorGeeks Cleanup
info.description: Simple but effective script that cuts out the whole top logo & banner ads and gets straight to what you want - the software listings & search, even if you do NOT have AdBlock.  Appended June 13 2007 to include a new ad table, ".TPtable."

data.title: The "Next" and "Previous" functions at the bottom
